result.eng: Watch out, your bag is open!
result.ga: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.orig: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailt
result.html: Seachain tá do mhála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!
result.ponchtml: Seaċain tá do ṁála ar oscailtWatch out, your bag is open!

result.eng: Take it out of the bag.
result.html: Tóg as an mhála éTake it out of the bag.
result.ponchtml: Tóg as an ṁála éTake it out of the bag.

result.eng: I have my whistles here in my bag.
result.ga: Tá mo chuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo mhála
result.orig: Tá mo chuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo mhála
result.html: Tá mo chuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo mhálaI have my whistles here in my bag.
result.ponchtml: Tá mo ċuid feadógaí agam anseo i mo ṁálaI have my whistles here in my bag.
